[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]MiningCo.: Mobile mineral sonar[/h1]
Surface resources are becoming scarce ? Wandering the plains is too dangerous for you ? Then MiningCo. has [b]THE[/b] solution for [b]YOU![/b]
MiningCo. is proud to present you the [b]Mobile mineral sonar[/b], one of the jewel of our mining systems collection. Thanks to our revolutionary MiSoTech™, jointly designed and tested by our highly experienced teams of engineers and deep-space miners, the Mobile mineral sonar is an essential asset for every miner.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/f6eXi0L.png[/img]
[h2]Features[/h2] [list] [*]Scans the heart of big mountains for metallic objects. [*]Can be easily displaced when the scan is finished (minifiable). [*]Battery-powered: the optional connection with a power net will boost scan speed. [/list]
[h2]Technical support[/h2] MiningCo. is continuously trying to improve its product to raise its customers satisfaction. Any constructive criticism is always welcome! :)
[h2]Modders note[/h2] You may be interrested in the following features: [list] [*]Custom place worker restricter [*]Draw dynamic textures and over fog [/list]
[h2]License[/h2] You are free to get inspiration from this little work and include it in any other mod/modpack. Just put a link to this mod so people can use it as a standalone version too. So this is basically licensed under http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
See the forum thread for content/changelog. https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=14711.msg153939#msg153939
